message: Hey i want to work in the e-governance field in india
Any idea where i should start ??
There seems to be ample opportunities in india regarding e-governance .
Much of the official processes lack automation and IT has still not been implemented esp. in sub-urban and rural areas.
This is a great idea, but looking at the current political conditions and the current status of similar products/companies, you should work on a solid business plan before starting any venture.
Hey , sameerg : the site u mentioned is itself a clutter. i mean a clean and easily accessible e-governance service.

You can work in civilian issues like digital process to assist the community, government intelligence or something like that. I'm working in public investment systems to improve the use of budgets of public money in Latam.
